column5: Finally got the boat out a couple times this month.  Targetting walleye and musky on Scugog.  No luck yet getting that first 'ski, but, have caught walters everytime out. Weedbeds, weedbeds, weedbeds in about 5 to 8 feet of water. Couple of pics...      Lots of crappie, perch and a few OOS bass (quickly released) as well.
lol poor cliff.. seems like he's the only one not getting any. nice ones man. i like fishing the drop offs for them since they are 4 weeks ahead this year..

Thanks, guys, nothing big (three in the slot ranging from 14 1/2"-16") one just under.  Kept two of the in slots, along with a couple of crappie and one large perch for supper last night.  What a great father's day feed!!!
Well, the one thing you have to admit, I'm consistant LOL. I didn't tarnish my record again this weekend
lol! cliff find 8fow, toss out a silver husky jerk into a weedline in the morning, then switch over to perch colors later in the day, if you dont get anything i'll come out there myself!
Great Report. Certainly looks like perfect pickerel weather. Thanks for sharing.
Frankie65,  I noticed in your last photo there is what appears to be a free launch in the background.  Can you share where that is on Scugog.  PM if you prefer.  Thanks.  KawarthaGuy
Kawartha Guy, PM me I'll give you a list of free Launches on Scugog.. but I wont tell you wich one he is fishing infront of unless I have his permission

Thanks, fish-meister.  Go ahead and tell him in a PM.  I debated blanking out the background, but, after thinking about it said what the heck.  All I ask from people that fish there is don't abuse it.  I have a self imposed limit of two walleye, plus the slot is in effect.  There are plenty of crappie, perch and sunfish for a great fish feed!!

ya not only walleye, crappie and pan fish I have caught plenty of musky and other fish there too! but I am not one to give away peoples spots, I have PM'd him with a list of 10 or so free launches around lake Scugog, If he is still interested in that same location with your permission I will tell him.
